meanings.definition: The act of making something circular.
meanings.sent1: The circularization of the pizza dough was done by rolling it out with a rolling pin.
meanings.sent2: The circularization of the wheel helped it move smoothly along the road.
meanings.sent3: The circularization of the pancake caused it to resemble a perfect circle.
meanings.sent4: The circularization of the ring symbolized eternity and never-ending love.
meanings.sent5: The circularization of the clock face made it easy to read the time from any angle.

meanings.definition: The process of sending out circulars or letters to a large number of people.
meanings.sent1: The company's circularization of promotional flyers reached many potential customers.
meanings.sent2: The circularization of the newsletter informed all employees about the upcoming event.
meanings.sent3: The circularization of the invitations led to a full house at the party.
meanings.sent4: The circularization of the campaign material boosted awareness about the cause.
meanings.sent5: The circularization of the announcements ensured everyone was well-informed.
